{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6228nS |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/15/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9562281018 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed=390 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206E |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16HS-6K |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=80:1F:02 |oui_eth=80:1F:02 }} '''150Mbps Wireless 802.11b/g/n Broadband Router'''
[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=376&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=2 Product page] :There would appear to be multiple revisions of this hardware..
"1242-00000301-01Z_ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :EDIMAX BR-6228nS (1242-01000301-51Z) CPU: RTL8196C, Flash: MX25L3206E :Per ''Edimax'''s specs, this device has 4MB Flash.
The default SSID may be '''default''', '''Edimax''', or something else entirely.
==Images== <gallery> File:Edimax BR-6228nS.jpg|board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
